title: Yeni hayat = New life
creator_credit: Kenan Besiroglu, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Kenan Besiroglu migrated to Australia with his wife and son in 1970. This is a story of hard work, perseverance and the promise of a new life.
creator_credit_for_label: Kenan Besiroglu, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
description: Kenan Besiroglu migrated to Australia with his wife and son in 1970. This is a story of hard work, perseverance and the promise of a new life.
